content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I am sure that it will be a great fit for you. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros per month.

I am a responsible and dependable person. I want to be on good terms with the landlord.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

I am open to negotiation.

I am interested in the apartment, but I need to see it before I make a decision.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for letting me know your budget and your desire to be a responsible tenant. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I must inform you that my monthly rental for this 25 square meter apartment is 1200 Euros. I believe that this is a fair price for the location and the quality of the apartment. I would be happy to discuss any additional terms or conditions that you may have in mind, but I am afraid that I cannot lower the rental price any further. If you are still interested in the apartment, I would be happy to arrange a viewing at your convenience.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am open to negotiation. I will see the apartment first and then decide.

I appreciate your willingness to discuss the rental price with me.

I am looking forward to seeing the apartment.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your understanding and your willingness to negotiate. I am glad to hear that you are looking forward to seeing the apartment. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, and I will do my best to address them.
name: Heinrich Heine
